Go Back Review Name: Product good but worst and installation service by Jeeves Review Description: Good job and good experience by Flipkart but worst installation service by JEEVES. I have never seen such a unprofessional person by any customer service. Installation was not proper and completed . Person with Jeeves not done good job and insisted forcefully my wife to get better rating on there customer care. I was shocked how flipkart has collaborated such cheaters and unprofessional persons. Such type of service will definitely malign the service of flipkart. Its my suggestion to buyer please dont consider installation by Jeeves. I think local service and installation is far better than jeeves.
